text: Mahesh Kumar Kanodia (27 January 1937 â€“ 25 October 2020) was an Indian politician. He represented the Patan constituency of Gujarat and was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Before becoming a politician, he was a singer. Kanodia was born in Gujarat, India. Kanodia was a member of the Lok Sabha between 1991 to 2009. Kanodia died in Mumbai on 25 October 2020, aged 83.Mahesh Kumar Kanodia passes away: Gujarati celebs mourn the demise of the legendary singer ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Gujarat Category:Indian singers Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Mahesh Kumar Kanodia
